headlines.description: Liverpool moved top of the Premier League ahead of Manchester City's match at Burnley on Saturday with a 2-0 win over relegation-threatened Watford.
headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool go top with crucial win over Watford

events.name: Norwich City at Brighton & Hove Albion

headlines.description: Brighton & Hove Albion and Norwich City played out a 0-0 draw at the AMEX Stadium on Saturday to end six-match losing streaks in the Premier League.
headlines.shortLinkText: Brighton held to goalless draw by lowly Norwich

headlines.description: Manchester City responded to momentarily losing top spot in the Premier League by returning to the summit courtesy of a 2-0 win at Burnley.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man City leapfrog Liverpool as title twists continue

headlines.description: Christian Eriksen scored his first goal for Brentford as his side claimed a memorable 4-1 away win vs. Chelsea in the Premier League on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Eriksen on target as Brentford stun Chelsea

headlines.description: James Ward-Prowse scored a trademark free-kick as Southampton rescued a Premier League point at Leeds United in a 1-1 draw on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Stunning Ward-Prowse free-kick earns Southampton draw at Leeds

headlines.description: Wolverhampton Wanderers continued their European qualification bid after an volley from Jonny helped them to a 2-1 win over Aston Villa on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Wolves keep European hopes alive with win over Villa

headlines.description: A second-half Fred equaliser earned an underwhelming Manchester United a draw against Leicester City in the Premier League on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man United drop points in sluggish Leicester draw
